name: Thielf
description:
Thielf is a simple puzzle game made by Team Chicken Nugget for the Gamegen Game Jam 2º

You play as a goblin and your objective is to collect and put all the gems in their correct glowing vase.

There are only 3 rules.

While carrying the Blue Gem, you can only move vertically, when carrying the Yellow Gem you can only move horizontally and when carrying the Green Gem you can only move diagonaly.

Good luck :D

Controls:

WASD to move.

Credits:

Yerón Martín Sánchez - (Art & Design)
Antonio Arian Silaghi (Programming & Tech)
